page.title: 04My Special Day 1
page.content: This special day was during Whitson Bank Holiday.The first thing I did was I got up at nine o' clock.Ithen washed and chainged and went downstairs to have breakfast.I had cereal it was called Smacks and a cup of tea.After breakfast I went to watch Bonanza on television and after it had finished I had a game of snooker with my brother. Then I went with my father and mother in the car to Bonllwyn to get a bag of peat.After we came back my mother cooked us lunch.We had potatoes,peas, gravy and chicken.In the afternoon I went out to the road with my brother to kick the ball back and forward.Then Andrew Louise's brother came out so we went into the field to have a game of soccer.I was goalkeeper first and Andrew and Hefin were scoring,we then took turns at scoring and saving.
